week_1.author: Ali Hassan
week_1.text: I'm confused about the difference between <section> and <article>.

week_1.author: Fatema Ahmed
week_1.text: Are we allowed to use <b> and <i> tags, or should we always use <strong> and <em>?

week_2.author: Ali Hassan
week_2.text: The box model is tricky. Does the border count as part of the width?
